name: serverless-todo
description: React TodoMVC with a Serverless backend

scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --region us-east-1 --template-file template.yml --output-template-file packaged-template.yml --s3-bucket $CODE_BUCKET
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --region us-east-1 --template-file packaged-template.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --stack-name dev-connect-$USER

author: Evan Chiu <evan@evanchiu.com>
